name: Final Draft 8 Template
summary: Learn about .FDXT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The FDXT extension was introduced with Final Draft version 8. Versions 5-7 of Final Draft use the .FDT extension.

description: Document template created by Final Draft, a program used for authoring TV, movie, and stage play scripts; saves the layout and formatting information for a script; enables writers to author multiple .FDX documents using the same base formatting.
